# PBI #11: Update Documentation

**Priority:** Medium  
**Story Points:** 2  
**Labels:** `documentation`

## Description
Update project documentation to reflect the new tag suggestions feature.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] README.md updated with feature description
- [ ] AGENTS.md updated with new architecture components
- [ ] All new classes have comprehensive KDoc
- [ ] Dependencies documented
- [ ] User-facing documentation included
- [ ] Technical documentation for developers

## Dependencies
- Should be done last, after all features implemented

See TAG_SUGGESTIONS_IMPLEMENTATION_PLAN.md for full details.
